config.question: Which of the following refers to the framework of a federal system that James Madison drew up prior the Philadelphia Convention?

answer_3.response: Even before all the delegates had arrived, Madison drew up a framework for a new federal system known as the Virginia Plan. It envisioned a national legislature of two houses, one elected directly by the people, the other chosen by the first house from nominations made by the state assemblies.
